item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）将评述小米积极与 iPhone 正面交锋的反响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: Lyft 测试忠诚度计划，为未来乘车提供现金返还
item.description: Lyft 公司正在试行一项计划，为部分客户提供未来乘车的现金返还，这是该公司从竞争对手优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Lyft Inc. is piloting a program that offers some customers cash back on future rides, the latest effort to win over users from rival Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.description: 事实证明，中国是美国难以取代的世界制造业强国。【原文：China is proving a difficult rival for the US to dethrone as the world’s manufacturing powerhouse.】

item.title: Guerreiro 将作为罕见的女性首席执行官领导葡萄牙桑坦德银行
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，伊莎贝尔-盖雷罗（Isabel Guerreiro）是桑坦德银行葡萄牙分行首席执行官的最佳人选，这将是该国罕见的由女性担任高级职务的情况。【原文：Isabel Guerreiro is the top candidate to become the chief executive officer of Banco Santander SA’s Portuguese unit, in what would be a rare elevation of a woman to a top role in the country, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Beyond Meat 股价大涨，涨幅扩大至近 1,300
item.description: Beyond Meat 公司的股价在周三的盘前交易中翻了一番，使其四天来的涨幅达到近 1300%，这与不时骚动市场的 "备忘录股 "狂潮如出一辙。【原文：Beyond Meat Inc. shares doubled in premarket trading Wednesday, boosting its four-day rally to almost 1,300%, in an echo of the meme-stock frenzies that periodically roil the market.】

item.title: AT&T 因促销活动增加了更多移动和互联网用户
item.description: AT&T Inc. 今年夏天新增的移动电话和家庭互联网用户数量超过了分析师的预期，该公司正大力开展促销活动，以保持对两大竞争对手的竞争压力。【原文：AT&T Inc. added more mobile phone and home internet subscribers this summer than analysts expected, amid a heavy promotional push to keep competitive pressure on its two main rivals.】

item.title: 十月暴跌后，法拉利分析师比以往更加乐观
item.description: 投资者日的谨慎预测使法拉利公司的股价有望在本月创下历史最差纪录，但分析师对这只因其奢侈品地位而日益受到青睐的股票却比以往任何时候都更加看好。【原文：Cautious investor-day forecasts have put Ferrari NV shares on track for their worst month on record, yet analysts are more positive than ever on a stock that’s increasingly favored for its luxury status.】

item.description: 今年，主权债务谈判中使用的一种深奥且经常引起争议的金融工具成了头条新闻，而原因却大错特错。【原文：An esoteric and often controversial financial instrument used in sovereign debt negotiations has been making headlines this year — for all the wrong reasons.】

item.title: 美国早期财报显示公司业绩为四年来最佳
item.description: 本季度美国公司盈利超过预期的比例是四年多来最高的，这让股票投资者在涨势放缓时松了一口气。【原文：The proportion of US companies beating earnings expectations this quarter is the highest in more than four years, providing stock investors with relief at a time the rally is slowing.】

item.title: WhatsApp 和生成式人工智能将巴西推向金融业的未来
item.description: 银行正在利用人工智能生成技术，让向巴西任何人汇款变得像发短信一样简单，这一进步有助于巩固巴西在人工智能金融服务领域的全球领先地位。【原文：Banks are using generative artificial intelligence to make sending money to anyone in Brazil as easy as sending a text, an advance that’s helping cement the nation’s place among global leaders in AI-powered financial services.】

item.title: 美联储主席热门候选人沃勒支持降息而不向特朗普低头
item.description: 当美联储官员上个月开会时，投资者确信 2025 年的首次降息即将到来。但许多人不禁要问，行长克里斯托弗-沃勒会怎么做？【原文：When Federal Reserve officials met last month, investors were convinced the first interest-rate cut of 2025 was coming. But what, many wondered, would Governor Christopher Waller do?】

item.title: 对冲基金麦哲伦称迪拜监管机构已结束调查并批准公司清盘
item.description: 麦哲伦资本有限公司（Magellan Capital Limited）表示，迪拜金融监管机构已经结束了对这家对冲基金初创公司的调查，在一名前雇员投诉引发的长达数月的调查之后，没有发现任何不当证据。【原文：Magellan Capital Limited said Dubai’s financial regulator has ended an investigation into the hedge fund startup, and found no evidence of impropriety following a months-long probe prompted by complaints from a former employee.】

item.title: 首席执行官称菲律宾最大铜矿需要战略合作伙伴
item.description: 菲律宾最大的金矿和铜矿公司正在寻找战略合作伙伴，其首席执行官表示，该公司正在推迟投产时间。【原文：The company behind what is set to be the Philippines’ largest gold and copper mine is searching for a strategic partner, its chief executive said, as it pushes back its production timeline.】

item.title: 以色列气田关闭，埃及重新安排液化天然气运输
item.description: 由于以色列一个主要气田的维护工作切断了对这个北非国家的供应，埃及正寻求将一些液化天然气货物的进口提前到本月。【原文：Egypt is seeking to bring forward import of some LNG cargoes to this month as maintenance work at a major field in Israel cuts supplies to the North African country.】

item.title: 韩国 9000 亿美元养老基金管理公司寻找新首席执行官
item.description: 全球最大的养老基金之一--韩国国民年金局已经启动了任命新首席执行官的程序。【原文：South Korea’s National Pension Service, one of the world’s largest pension funds, has launched the process to appoint a new chief executive officer.】

item.title: 上月撤资的黄金 ETF 投资者看来很有先见之明
item.description: 上个月，投资者从追踪金矿企业的最大 ETF 中撤资 6.69 亿美元，本周二之后，这些投资者无疑显得很聪明。【原文：Investors who pulled $669 million last month from the biggest ETF tracking gold miners certainly look smart after Tuesday.】

item.title: 伦敦房价一年多来首次下降
item.description: 国家统计局周三公布的数据显示，伦敦房价出现了自2024年7月以来的首次下跌。【原文：House prices in London suffered their first drop since July 2024, according to data released Wednesday by the Office for National Statistics.】

item.title: 中国仿人机器人制造商在首次公开募股前融资 2 亿美元
item.description: 乐居机器人公司（Leju Robotics）在计划上市前筹集了超过 2 亿美元的新资金，显示出投资者对中国新兴仿人机器人行业的持续兴趣，因为该公司正在与美国竞争对手展开竞争。【原文：Leju Robotics raised more than $200 million in fresh funding ahead of a planned listing, demonstrating sustained investor interest in China’s emerging humanoid robot sector as it competes with US rivals.】

item.title: Orcel 称裕信银行有能力减轻意大利银行税带来的冲击
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官安德里亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）表示，该银行应能减轻政府向银行筹集更多资金的计划所带来的冲击。【原文：UniCredit SpA Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel said the Italian lender should be able to mitigate any hit from a plan by the government to raise more money from banks.】

item.title: 特斯拉停止增长，投资者转向人工智能未来之梦
item.description: 在巨型科技巨头林立的股市中，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.其中最主要的原因是它的盈利增长乏力，而股价却持续飙升。【原文：In the stock market’s rarefied air where mega-cap technology behemoths reside, Tesla Inc. stands out — but for all the wrong reasons. Chief among them is its stunning lack of earnings growth while its stock price continues to soar.】

item.title: 土耳其反对派遭镇压为何令市场哗然
item.description: 政治稳定通常是新兴市场投资者所珍视的。然而，由于对该国政治反对派的司法镇压似乎巩固了雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安总统长达二十多年的统治，土耳其股票和债券今年大幅走低。【原文：Political stability is usually prized by investors in emerging markets. Yet Turkish stocks and bonds have lurched lower this year amid a judicial crackdown on the country’s political opposition that appeared to cement President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s more than two-decade rule.】

item.title: 中国芯片制造商扬子存储器据称考虑明年上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，扬子江存储科技股份有限公司正在考虑在中国大陆首次公开募股，估值可能超过 400 亿美元，这可能是中国大陆多年来最大的上市项目之一。【原文：Yangtze Memory Technologies Co. is considering an initial public offering in mainland China at a valuation that could exceed $40 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be one of the biggest listings there in years.】

item.title: 香港建议放宽基金规则以吸引全球经理人
item.description: 香港正在提议放宽共同基金的规则，以吸引更多的国际资产管理公司在中国开设分店。【原文：Hong Kong is proposing to ease rules for mutual funds to lure more international asset managers to set up shop in the Chinese territory.】

item.title: 西门子和 B2C2 采用摩根大通基于区块链的外汇平台
item.description: 工业巨头西门子公司（Siemens AG）和数字资产市场制造商 B2C2 已经开始使用摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Industrial giant Siemens AG and digital assets market maker B2C2 have started using JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s blockchain-based platform for foreign exchange payments, as deployment of the technology by large firms gathers pace.】

item.title: 中国在半导体调查中要求美国公司提供敏感数据
item.description: 作为对美国供应商调查的一部分，中国要求一些美国半导体公司提交有关其在全球最大芯片市场销售情况的敏感信息。【原文：China is demanding some US semiconductor firms submit sensitive information about their sales in the world’s largest chips market as part of its probe of American suppliers.】

item.title: 阿莫瓦说，欧洲央行被视为后盾，法国债务仍是买点
item.description: 阿莫瓦资产管理公司（Amova Asset Management）一直在抢购法国政府债券，即使在评级公司降低其信用评分的情况下，也要赌法国 "大到不能倒"。【原文：Amova Asset Management has been snapping up French government bonds, betting the country is “too big to fail” even as ratings companies slash its credit score.】
